mapper.select: SELECT u.name, b.id, b.building_num, b.floor, b.doorplate, wm.reading AS previousReading FROM ( SELECT wm.id, wm.user_id, wm.building_id, wm.reading, wm.time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY wm.user_id ORDER BY wm.time DESC) AS rn FROM water_meter wm JOIN user ON wm.user_id = user.id AND user.deleted = 0 WHERE wm.time BETWEEN #{lastMonth} AND #{now} ) wm JOIN user u ON u.id = wm.user_id AND u.deleted = 0 JOIN building b ON wm.building_id = b.id WHERE wm.rn = 1 ORDER BY u.building_id
